events.title: Family Dinner
events.description: Weekly family dinner. Everyone brings a dish or pitches in for groceries. Great way to connect with housemates.

events.title: Movie Night
events.description: Friday movie night on the big screen. Popcorn provided. Film chosen by vote.

events.title: Backyard Party
events.description: Outdoor gathering with fire pit, grill, and good company. Friends welcome.

events.title: Salon Discussion
events.description: Thoughtful conversation on a rotating topic. Tea and snacks provided.

events.title: Open House Tour
events.description: Tour the property and meet current residents. For prospective members.
